job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: REQUIREMENTS As a member of the team, you will: Be responsible for our end-to-end machine learning pipeline, from model development to production deployment. Build the team and drive the direction of the company. Shape our product and culture. Experience the direct impact of what you build on hundreds of millions of people’s financial lives. Required Skills: Python Machine Learning Rust NLP PyTorch The following is a big plus: Fluency in Python and PyTorch Experience with training and deploying models in multi-GPU environments Recognized open-source contributions Participation in competitive programming events (CTFs, IOI, IMO, Topcoder, Kaggle, etc.)
